name: Bit-Boom
description:
Run, shoot and collect coins! That's the whole bit-boom formula!

Graphics in the old style, eight-bit sounds and a sea of action and hardcore. In the bit-boom, you will visit the ruins of the tots, swarming with mummies and golems, in flooded dungeons, in which dangerous colmar and in the vicinity of ruins!

Fervent and driving gameplay and unusual performance will entice you! And all this bit-boom!
